security: This document concerns the favorable closure of a case under AR 604-10 regarding Manuel Marti. It states, 'Closure of SUBJECT's case under the provisions of AR 604-10 does not automatically qualify HIM for a security clearance.' Sharing this information could reveal processes and criteria used in determining security clearance eligibility, which could be exploited by individuals seeking to bypass these measures.
summary: This document details the favorable closure of Manuel Marti's case under AR 604-10, but notes that this closure does not automatically qualify him for a security clearance.
summary_one_paragraph: On September 22, 1969, William R. Phillips, LTC, MI, Chief of the Mil & Civ Loy Div of the USAPSG, communicated to the Assistant Chief of Staff, G2, regarding Manuel Marti (with identifying numbers U9 52 773 870 and SSAN: 093 36 4601). The communication confirms the Department of the Army's concurrence with the recommendation for favorable closure of Marti's case under AR 604-10. This closure has been added to Marti's intelligence dossier and forwarded to USAIRR, with a caveat that it doesn't automatically qualify him for a security clearance, and a review of his USAIRR file should be conducted before considering him for one.
title: [RESTRICTED]
